name: Dungeon Schmucks
description:
It's that time of the year again where your pockets are empty and the adventure calls! Explore a dungeon with your buds in hope to find some nice treasure.
DISCLAIMER: This game is just a demo!

FEATURES:

  • A turn-based battle system with levels and experience!
  • Different types of delicious enemies!
  • Paper Mario-like art-style in a fully 3D dungeon!
  • At least one joke!

CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS - Interact
Z - Jump
X - Interact/Talk/Advance Dialogue

6th submission to game-a-month
_______________________________________________________________________________________

Platforming Code and Art - Adam "Papercookies" Pype
Battle Code - Joseph "MoonGolf" Ferrari
